item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says market woes are more about tech stock sell-off than Trump's tariffs
item.description: "The Nasdaq peaked on DeepSeek day so that's a Mag 7 problem, not a MAGA problem," Bessent said.

item.title: Trump’s new tariffs ‘worse than the worst case scenario,’ Wedbush's Dan Ives says
item.description: President Donald Trump's extensive tariffs rollout on Wednesday was worse than expected for the market, according to Wedbush's Dan Ives.

item.title: This beat-up Big Tech play is a promising growth name, says Accuvest Global Advisors CIO
item.description: Chief Investment Officer Eric Clark called out two of his favorite plays on CNBC’s “Three-Stock Lunch” segment Wednesday.

item.title: U.S. stocks with the most revenue exposure in China if trade war breaks out
item.description: Goldman Sachs screened for stocks with revenue exposure of at least 25% to the Greater China region.

item.title: Beware Canada trade war: U.S. stocks with the most revenue exposure to the Great White North
item.description: As the market braces for President Trump's massive tariff rollout, investors should be cautious of some stocks that have meaningful Canada revenue exp...
